title: These people deserve a ban.. 18lp wasnt fair
body:
I am a silver 4 lad trying to climb up and as the season end comes that is what i get.. Riot should try and implement a new way to match players.. Maybe with the honor level, like in CS GO with trust factor or idk.. What is this freaking game? Also they must be more restrict with the acc registration, like in Korea.. So dumb to have 12yos playing with you.. All they were doing it was spamming in the chat after every kill "OMG", "1v1 me you broken champ play me is good than you" etc.. Lmao.. 
Btw, i could solo win the game as i was split pushing and all they were doing it was team fighting, but they surrendered.. and Xin especially must get banned for negative behaviour as he gave up since minute 6'... He was spamming FFs.. xd lol
[Removed by Moderation]

you're in silver 4, please don't act like this. Learn from it and play urgot/jax. honestly don't know how to respond to this overall. Bad games happen don't let them affect you. You tilt easily and then get banned/suspended for your toxicity.

I am not tilting man, the post was made in good spirit and its ok, games like this happen haha :P 
https://imgur.com/a/zGG4Tc6 
And of course i dont blame my team.. I learn from my mistakes but there are some games you cant win even though you try as hard as possible, it was one of those.. but its ok :P
I apologize. You're a good player (at camille) keep it up and you'll go far. kayn is really popular right now depending on how you build him you can win (almost) any game.
Heyo, just here to tell you to check his boards profile, he got banned.
I mean... You lost your lane too.
I didnt lose my lane in fact.. i was doing awesome against fiora and i had like 30cs lead until xin started coming top and going all in for no reason haha{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

My advice would be to stop acting like a victim and understand that it happens. I do like your idea about players getting matched with high honor level players, but honor isn't hard to get... The system was reworked but honor really doesn't mean much about a player.
